name: PixelCourier
description:
Pixel Courier by EggStill-Bro

A simple courier game with objective to deliver, earn money and grow.

You are required to deliver parcel to the destination.

Avoid hitting other vehicles on the road, you will lose money if you failed to do so.

At the end, you will earn an amount of fee, and you may grow your courier by upgrading courier speed and earning per delivery.

Submission for the 2022 Kenney Game Jam | Theme: Growth 

Made with Godot engine

Assets: https://kenney.nl/assets
